description:
Suwabara faces off against Monica Adenauer of Team America, who is revealed to be a world-champion patissier! Can he possibly beat her in making an artistic bread?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La La La! (Bare, Bare, Bare!): The Great Bread Battle!
Nue, Nu, Nus ! Le match des pains artistiques !
Ra * Ra * Ra!! Karei Naru Pan Shoubu!
โป๊ๆๆ! ศึกขนมปังสวยงาม!
裸[ラ]・裸[ラ]・裸[ラ]!! 華麗なるパン勝負!
